1: @@//brgyad//dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi//rdo <mistake>rjean</mistake> gyi zla gam <mistake>bzhin//pad</mistake> <mistake>mpad+ma'i</mistake> tshul yin te//rin chen tshul ni rin <mistake>then</mistake> gyi//sna tshogs kyi ni zlum por gsungs//ci ltar 'dod
2: pa ci bde bas//nang gi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa//re'u mig <mistake>brgyd</mistake> par 'dod pa'o//phyi yi dkyil 'khor <mistake>bus</mistake> gnas par//nang gi dkyil 'khor du ni 'dod//re'u mig brgyad kyi dbus gnas
3: pas//gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa yin//zhes dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//de la ji ltar rtog pa'i dngos grub dam pa yin zhe na/ji ltar bden par <mistake>dkil</mistake> 'khor <mistake>bdag /</mistake>
4: gang gis rtogs par nus pa <mistake>ni//gangis</mistake> yi dam lhar sbyor bas//grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ldog pa yin//bris sku <mistake>bis</mistake> pa'i <mistake>rsbyor</mistake> ba yis//rang sems bris par sbyor ba yin//lhag chad
5: cho gar gyur na yang //bsgrubs te skyon du mi 'gyur ro//de la ji ltar gsang ba lnga'i de nyid yin zhe na/sems dpa' gdod <mistake>mtha</mistake> ma med//rdo <mistake>je</mistake> sems <mistake>dba'</mistake> <mistake>dg'</mistake> ba che//kun <mistake>du</mistake> bzang po kun
6: gyi <mistake>bdag /rdo</mistake> rje snying po <mistake>gtsobo'i</mistake> gtso//gdod ma tha ma <mistake>mod</mistake> phyir <mistake>yang//dam</mistake> pa'i dang po zhes 'dod do//'khor lo kun <mistake>kyi</mistake> gtso phyir <mistake>ni//dama</mistake> <mistake>pa dam</mistake> pa'i dbang phyug yin//de la ji ltar bcom ldan
7: <mistake>'ldas</mistake> gang lags ci 'dra ba yin <mistake>zhen//'dod</mistake> pa chen po kun gyi <mistake>mchog /yid</mistake> bde <mistake>pas</mistake> ni 'dzum pa che//rtag par 'dzum pa'i bde ba <mistake>nges//dama</mistake> <mistake>pa bcom</mistake> ldan 'gyur ba <mistake>yi//dnas</mistake> de yi zla
8: mdog ni//dam pa yig <mistake>'bra</mistake> grub nyid <mistake>phyir //chos</mistake> rnams thams cad dag <mistake>phyar</mistake> dang //gsang ba de nyid rnam dag <mistake>phyir//do</mistake> rje 'dzin de zla ba'i <mistake>mdog /denas</mistake> de'i sna tshogs dmar ba'i 'od 'bar ba <mistake>ni//ci</mistake> <mistake>phyin</mistake>
